title: Cant connet to chat
body: 1. people are asking the same question and for help well it seems like where not getting some please help us reconnect to the chat its a big pain{{summoner:3}}

replies.body: chat is back working again, thanks rito for fix.

I don't currently see any issues with connecting to chat on NA.  Are you still experiencing any issues with this?  If so, give our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) a go-through to fix this up.  Hope that helps!
> _**I don't know if the problem is on NA but on EUW it's a big pain in the {{item:3075}}**_
Yup!  Some players are having issues connecting to chat on EUW right now.  We'll be keeping updates on our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#euw) page.

Having also this same problem. Tried changing date, restarting but nothing works.
Is RIOT aware of this ?
